title: Out shopping
creator_credit: R.H.R. Productions, Ronald H. Riley and Eric Marquis
brief_description: Two housewives go out on a morning’s shopping. Newly married Mrs A does it unthinkingly; mature Mrs B with dkill. The two meet and Mrs A learns some useful tips. Consumer instructional film successfully using a comedy approach avoiding offence to put across the positive message that shopping must be done carefully.
